Posts.Content: thanx for ur advice...i went to doc today and he felt the mass under my nipple under left breast...i had hoped i was feeling things but evidently he felt a mass also. So i go for a mammogram tomm. and ultrasound if needed. I am sorry about your havin it and am glad you are doing better also! Ive always put things off but this is one thing im not letting go at all. Some say oh ur too young etc. but id rather be safe than sorry. So.....ill see tomm. and hopefully its nothing. did u just happen to find urs one day? did it hurt and was it big? mines not real big and its not painful...just a hard lump!! thanx for ur help girls!
Posts.Title: lump in left breast

Posts.Content: thanx for ur reply...my mother had said the same thing. i just remember my ducts being clogged after giving birth and it hurt like an s.o.b and this is painless. id say my last mam. was about 5 years ago when i was preggers. i do check myself tho every other month or so since cancer of the breast runs so rampant in my family. i hope it is a clogged duct or something...i will check with my doc; unfortunately imma be worried until then. sigh.....
Posts.Title: lump in left breast

Posts.Content: hello...last night after taking a bath i for some unknown reason checked my breasts and noticed a hard lump in my left breast underneath and to the side of my nipple. it doesnt move but it is real hard and about the size of a dime. i check my breasts every once in awhile so i know my normal lumpiness and this new lump definately is new. i do know that ive had several great*aunts who all had breast cancer...im 27 btw. im wondering if i should be concerned? its not painful and ive not noticed any discharge from that nipple...its just a hard lump. should i go see my doc.?
Posts.Title: lump in left breast

Posts.Content: thank you so much i will defiantely request the ultrasound along with the mammogram...im already scheduled for the ultrasound so ill still demand that it get done whether or not the mamm. comes up normal...otherwise ill not rest until i have one. thats exactly how my lump feels...its under my nipple tho. this is scary! u havent scared me for ive been scared all weekend. id rather know the possibilites and details than be blind and deny the whole thing. Theres alot of history in my family of this cancer and ugh its so scary. Ill know tomm. and i will for sure let u know how it turns out...hopefully its nothing. weird that something told me to check that breast tho..that scares me. anyways im a bundle of nerves lol. im rambling..shaking. i know how u feel about quacky doctors, there seems to be too many of em out there too. Thanks for your help and i will update tomm. imma try and get some sleep now (yeah right lol). Have a good night and thanx again!
